p: Confirmed cases presented three CHIKV epidemic waves, characterized by a continuous reduction in total cases per year from 2016 to 2018 ( Figure 1 panel C). Importantly, our estimations of transmission potential remained roughly similar throughout the years; thus suggesting that the decreasing trend in the number of confirmed cases is likely a consequence of a gradual accumulation of herd-immunity over the 4 years of continuous circulation in Bahia after its introduction in 2014; similarly to what has been described for ZIKV in Feira de Santana [ 5].
